ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_K: Summon Hitmonlee with a RED_ORB and max PP.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_L: All enemy Pokémon are LOCKED for 5 seconds.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_M: All allied Pokémon are restored to max PP.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_N: All allied Pokémon gain [50,SP] SHIELD and cast $t(ability.EXPLOSION).
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_O: Cook a random dish for all your Pokémon next fight.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_Q: Immediately end the fight with a draw.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_R: The allied player gets 6 free shop rerolls.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_S: FREEZE all enemy Pokémon for 2 seconds.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_T: The allied player gets 3 random berries.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_U: Summon Uxie with AQUA_EGG and max PP.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_W: The allied player gets a high rarity Pokémon matching their highest synergy.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_X: Gives XRAY_VISION to all allied Pokémon. The item is removed at the end of the fight.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_Z: Put all enemy Pokémon to SLEEP for 5 seconds.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_QM: The allied player gets 4 random Unown on their bench.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_EM: Summon 4 random Unown, one at each corner of the battlefield.
ability_description.POISON_JAB: Deal [30,60,90,SP] SPECIAL, swap places with the target, and inflict both the target and the caster with POISONNED for 3 seconds.
ability_description.SHELL_SMASH: Deal [15,30,SP] SPECIAL to adjacent enemy Pokémon. Gain 2 ATK, 20 AP and 20 SPEED and lose 2 DEF and 2 SPE_DEF.
ability_description.HELPING_HAND: Grant [30,60,100,SP] SHIELD to the 2 nearest allied Pokémon and double the damage of their next ability.
ability_description.ASTRAL_BARRAGE: Send [7,SP] small ghosts toward random enemy Pokémon, each dealing 20 SPECIAL.
ability_description.WATERFALL: Gain [40,80,120,SP] SHIELD, cure any negative status conditions and clear the tile.
ability_description.PYRO_BALL: The user attacks by igniting a small stone and launching it as a fiery ball at the farthest enemy Pokémon, dealing [10,20,40,SP] SPECIAL and applying BURN for 2 seconds to all enemy Pokémon in its path.
ability_description.WHIRLPOOL: Unleash a hail of 4 whirlpools toward the farthest enemy Pokémon, each dealing [125,SP]% ATK SPECIAL to the first enemy Pokémon in their path.
ability_description.SMOKE_SCREEN: Channel underground and reappear in the middle of the enemy team, dealing [10,20,40,SP] SPECIAL to all adjacent enemy Pokémon and applying smoke to the back row, making enemies BLINDED.
ability_description.PRESENT: Either deal [80,SP], [150,SP] or [300,SP] SPECIAL to the target, or heal them for 50 HP, based on your LUCK.
ability_description.LEAF_BLADE: The user's next attack is a guaranteed critical hit dealing [100,SP]% of ATK as TRUE.
ability_description.ANCHOR_SHOT: Grab the farthest enemy Pokémon and deal [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL.
ability_description.MAGNET_RISE: Grant PROTECT for 2 seconds and [10,SP]% dodge chance to the user to the [2,4,6] adjacent allied Pokémon with the lowest health.
ability_description.ATTRACT: Inflict [1,2,3] random enemy Pokémon with CHARM for [1,SP] seconds.
ability_description.WATER_PULSE: Deal [75,150,SP] SPECIAL to the target and adjacent enemy Pokémon and inflict them with CONFUSION for 2 seconds.
ability_description.PLAY_ROUGH: Deal [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL to the target and inflict it with CHARM for 2.5 seconds.
ability_description.PARABOLIC_CHARGE: Heal the user for [25,50] HP and deal [25,50,100,SP] SPECIAL damage to the target. Excess HP is converted into SPECIAL.
ability_description.SUPER_FANG: Deal [30,60,90,SP] SPECIAL to the target. The damage is doubled if the target is GRASS.
ability_description.TEETER_DANCE: Gain [20,SP] SPEED. All other Pokémon are CONFUSION for 3 seconds, allies and enemies alike.
ability_description.CLOSE_COMBAT: Deal [130,SP] SPECIAL to the target and reduce the user's DEF and SPE_DEF by 2.
ability_description.AQUA_RING: Dive into the middle of the allied team, creating an aquatic ring that cures negative status conditions and heals for [20,30,50,SP] HP.
ability_description.POISON_GAS: A cloud of stinky gas is thrown in the face of all adjacent enemy Pokémon, dealing [15,30,60,SP] SPECIAL and inflicting POISONNED for 3 seconds.
ability_description.ASSIST: Use the ability of a random allied Pokémon.
ability_description.FISSURE: Open [2,3,4] rifts. Each rift deals [25,50,75,SP] SPECIAL.
ability_description.ASSURANCE: Deal [25,50,100,SP] SPECIAL to the target. The damage is doubled if the user has less than 50% HP.
ability_description.BRAVE_BIRD: Fly away with the target dealing [30,60,90,SP] SPECIAL.
ability_description.MAGICAL_LEAF: The user scatters curious leaves that chase the farthest target, dealing [10,20,40,SP] SPECIAL and inflicting ARMOR_BREAK for 3 seconds to all enemy Pokémon in its path.
ability_description.STEALTH_ROCKS: Lay sharp stones within a 2 tile sector in front of the user, dealing [50,SP] SPECIAL to any enemy Pokémon in the area. The stones remain on the battlefield, dealing 10 PHYSICAL per second and WOUND non ROCK or FLYING enemy Pokémon that walk on it.
ability_description.TAIL_GLOW: Deal [30,SP] SPECIAL to adjacent enemy Pokémon and increase the user's AP by 50%.
ability_description.STRUGGLE_BUG: Deal [30,SP] SPECIAL to adjacent enemy Pokémon and reduce their AP by 50%.
ability_description.PRISMATIC_LASER: The user shoots a 3-tile wide prismatic laser in a straight line, dealing [80,SP] SPECIAL and displacing any enemy Pokémon in its path.
ability_description.NATURAL_GIFT: Heal the most damaged allied Pokémon for [30,60,120,SP] HP and grant them RUNE_PROTECT for [1,2,3] seconds.
ability_description.NIGHT_SHADE: Deal [25,33,50,SP=0.5]% of target's max HP as TRUE.
ability_description.CHARGE_BEAM: Fire a concentrated bundle of electricity that propagates to a maximum of 3 adjacent enemy Pokémon, dealing [15,30,60,SP] SPECIAL to each.
ability_description.POPULATION_BOMB: Deal 10 SPECIAL [4,8,12,16,SP] times to the target.
ability_description.SCREECH: Reduce DEF of all enemies in a 2-range radius by [2,4,8,SP].
ability_description.SAND_TOMB: Deal [10,20,40,SP] SPECIAL to the target and inflict them with SILENCE and PARALYSIS for [3,5,8] seconds.
ability_description.WHIRLWIND: Deal [40,80,120,SP] SPECIAL to the target and make them fly away.
ability_description.EMPTY_LIGHT: Spit poison directly at an enemy Pokémon, dealing [33,SP] SPECIAL and reducing their SPE_DEF by 5. The ability then rebounds to another adjacent enemy (5 bounces max).
ability_description.UNBOUND: Unbinds itself to become Hoopa's true form and gains a humongous amount of power.
ability_description.HYPERSPACE_FURY: Using its many arms, unleashes a barrage of [4,SP] attacks. Each attack deals 15 SPECIAL to the target and lowers their DEF and SPE_DEF by 1.
ability_description.SNIPE_SHOT: Fire a shot of water from the user's index fingertips at the farthest enemy Pokémon, dealing [40,80,160,SP] SPECIAL to all enemy Pokémon in its path.
ability_description.AIR_SLASH: Deal [25,50,100,SP] SPECIAL to the target and inflict them with FLINCH for 7 seconds.
ability_description.EGGSPLOSION: Launch an explosive egg at the target, dealing [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL to all adjacent enemy Pokémon and inflicting them with ARMOR_BREAK for 4 seconds. For each enemy Pokémon KO'd, there is a [25,LK]% chance of an egg appearing on the allied player's bench.
ability_description.FLORAL_HEALING: Heal HP equal to max PP of Comfey's holder or Comfey itself if not held.
ability_description.VINE_WHIP: Deal [100,SP] SPECIAL to the target and cause them and all adjacent enemy Pokémon to FLINCH for 3 seconds.
ability_description.BODY_SLAM: Deal [30,SP]% of the user's max HP as SPECIAL to the target.
ability_description.BARB_BARRAGE: Dive into the middle of the enemy team, dealing [15,30,60,SP] SPECIAL to all adjacent enemy Pokémon and inflict them with POISONNED for 3 seconds.
ability_description.MAGIC_POWDER: Gain [10,20,40,SP] SHIELD and SILENCE adjacent enemy Pokémon for [2,3,4] seconds.
ability_description.INFERNAL_PARADE: Shoot a returning Flame Wheel at farthest enemy, dealing [30, SP] SPECIAL twice to all enemy Pokémon in its path with a [50,LK]% chance to apply BURN for 3s.
ability_description.RETALIATE: Deal [100,SP]% of ATK as SPECIAL to the target + 1 additional attack for each fallen allied Pokémon.
ability_description.SLASH: Deal [10,20,40,SP] SPECIAL to the target with a [30,60,90]% increased CRIT_CHANCE ratio. Can crit by default.
ability_description.OUTRAGE: Deal [100,150,200,SP]% ATK as SPECIAL to the target and adjacent enemy Pokémon and inflict the user with CONFUSION for 2 seconds.
ability_description.LUNGE: Jump to the enemy Pokémon with the highest ATK, dealing [50,SP] SPECIAL and reducing its ATK by [5,SP].
ability_description.KNOCK_OFF: Deal [90,SP] SPECIAL to the target, +[30,SP] SPECIAL for each item held by the target. All of the target's items are removed.
ability_description.FISHIOUS_REND: Deal [80,SP] SPECIAL to the target. The damage is doubled if the user has more SPEED than the target.
ability_description.CURSE: Inflict the highest HP enemy Pokémon with CURSE that will KO after [8,5,3,SP=-0.2] seconds.
ability_description.DOOM_DESIRE: After 2 seconds, deal [150,SP] SPECIAL to the target. Restore 60 PP if the target is KO'd in the duration.
ability_description.TIME_TRAVEL: Go back in time to retrieve lost health. Cure the negative status conditions of all allied Pokémon and heal them for [25,SP] HP.
ability_description.POLTERGEIST: Deal [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL to the target, +[20,SP] SPECIAL for each item held by the target ([40,SP] for ARTIFICIAL items).
ability_description.GOLD_RUSH: Deal  [20,SP] + the allied player's GOLD value as SPECIAL, then the allied player earns 2 GOLD.
ability_description.MAKE_IT_RAIN: Deal [100,SP] + the allied player's GOLD value as SPECIAL.
ability_description.CRUSH_GRIP: The target is crushed with great force. The more HP the target has left, the greater the damage: between [50,SP] and [250,SP] PHYSICAL.
ability_description.AURASPHERE: Exude an aura and project energy in a line, dealing [25,50,100,SP] SPECIAL and inflicting all enemy Pokémon hit with SILENCE for 3 seconds.
ability_description.SKETCH: Copy the ability, max PP and STAR of the allied Pokémon on the user's left at the start of the fight.
ability_description.OVERDRIVE: Twang an electric guitar, causing a huge echo and strong vibration. Deal [120,SP]% of ATK as SPECIAL within a 3 tile radius of the user, -20% damage per tile from the user.
ability_description.LOVELY_KISS: Kiss the enemy Pokémon with a frightening expression. Put the target to SLEEP for [2,4,6,SP] seconds. If the target is already suffering from SLEEP, deal [50,100,150,SP] SPECIAL instead.
ability_description.TRANSFORM: Take the appearance and the stats of the target (except HP).
ability_description.PSYCHIC_FANGS: Deal [100,SP] PHYSICAL and remove all the target's ATK, DEF and SPE_DEF stat increases.
ability_description.SHED_TAIL: Create a substitute and charge towards the ally with the lowest HP, granting them [80, SP] SHIELD.
ability_description.NIGHT_SLASH: Deal [15,30,60,SP] SPECIAL to the target. Can crit by default.
ability_description.KOWTOW_CLEAVE: Deal 150% ATK to the target, + [20,SP]% TRUE for each fallen allied Pokémon. Can crit by default
ability_description.SHIELDS_DOWN: Transform Minior to a random core form.
ability_description.SHIELDS_UP: Transform Minior to its meteor form.
ability_description.SANDSEAR_STORM: Searingly hot sand that strikes all enemy Pokémon in a straight line, dealing [80,SP] SPECIAL and applying BURN for 2 seconds.
ability_description.WILDBOLT_STORM: Thunderous tempest that strikes all enemy Pokémon in a straight line, dealing [80,SP] SPECIAL and inflicting PARALYSIS for 4 seconds.
ability_description.BLEAKWIND_STORM: Savagely cold winds that strike all enemy Pokémon in a straight line, dealing [80,SP] SPECIAL and applying FREEZE for 2 seconds.
ability_description.SPRINGTIDE_STORM: Fierce winds brimming with love and hate strike all enemy Pokémon in a straight line, dealing [80,SP] SPECIAL and inflicting CHARM for 2 seconds.
ability_description.AURA_WHEEL: Deal [60,SP] SPECIAL to the target, gain [10,SP] SPEED and switch between Normal and Hangry form.
ability_description.LICK: Deal [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL to the target and inflict them with CONFUSION and PARALYSIS for 3 seconds.
ability_description.FURY_SWIPES: Deal a random number of basic attacks between [2,SP] to [5,SP] times. This number increases with LUCK.
ability_description.TICKLE: Reduce ATK and DEF of the [1,2] closest enemy Pokémon by [3,SP].
ability_description.AROMATHERAPY: Cure negative status conditions and heal adjacent allied Pokémon for [20,40,80,SP] HP.
ability_description.DETECT: PROTECT adjacent allied Pokémon for [0.5,SP,ND=1] seconds, multiplied by the number of enemy Pokémon detected in a 2 tile radius.
ability_description.SPACIAL_REND: Reverse the position of the enemy team, then deal [100,SP] SPECIAL to all enemy Pokémon in the same row as the target.
ability_description.MULTI_ATTACK: Deal [15,SP] SPECIAL to adjacent enemy Pokémon, multiplied by the sum of levels of all $t(pkm.SILVALLY) additional synergies.
ability_description.STICKY_WEB: Deal [20,35,70,SP] SPECIAL to the target and project a web around them. Enemy Pokémon walking on the web are inflicted with PARALYSIS for 2 seconds.
ability_description.ACCELEROCK: Jump next to the farthest enemy and deal [100,SP]% of ATK as SPECIAL to them. Reduce the user's DEF by 2 and increase their SPEED by 5 up to [5,SP] times.
ability_description.PETAL_BLIZZARD: Deal [30,SP] SPECIAL to all enemy Pokémon in RANGE and gain 10 AP.
ability_description.SUNSTEEL_STRIKE: Jump and land in the middle of the enemy team with the power of a meteor, Dealing [80,SP] SPECIAL to all adjacent enemy Pokémon.
ability_description.MOONGEIST_BEAM: Deal [100,SP] SPECIAL to all enemy Pokémon in a line behind the target and inflict them with PARALYSIS for 3 seconds. Allied Pokémon in the beam gain [100,SP] SHIELD.
ability_description.FLEUR_CANNON: Launch a devastating laser beam, dealing [120,SP] SPECIAL to all enemy Pokémon in the path and reduce the user's AP by 20.
ability_description.SPIRIT_BREAK: Deal [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL to the target and reduce their AP by [20,SP].
ability_description.SHEER_COLD: A blast of absolute-zero cold deals [50,100,200,SP] SPECIAL to the target with [10,20,30,LK]% chance to execute. The more HP the user has relative to the target, the greater the chance. Always execute enemy Pokémon suffering from FREEZE, but never execute ICE Pokémon.
ability_description.EXTREME_SPEED: Dash to the farthest enemy, dealing [40,SP] PHYSICAL to all enemy Pokémon in the path.
ability_description.ZAP_CANNON: Fire an electric blast like a cannon, dealing [25,50,100,SP] SPECIAL to the target and inflicting them with PARALYSIS and ARMOR_BREAK for [1,2,4] seconds.
ability_description.PSYCHO_BOOST: Slash the target and any enemy Pokémon adjacent to them in the same row, dealing [140,SP] SPECIAL. Reduce the user's AP by 20 for each Pokémon hit.
ability_description.ICE_HAMMER: Deal [50,100,SP] SPECIAL to the target, applying FREEZE for 3 seconds. The user is inflicted with PARALYSIS for 3 seconds.
ability_description.POLLEN_PUFF: Give the lowest HP allied Pokémon a pollen puff that heals them for [30,60,120,SP] HP.
ability_description.PSYSTRIKE: Materialize a strange psychic wave toward the farthest enemy Pokémon, dealing [80,SP] PHYSICAL to them and teleporting all Pokémon in its path.
ability_description.FACADE: Deal [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL, doubled if the user suffers from a negative status condition.
ability_description.DREAM_EATER: Jump next to an enemy suffering from SLEEP, deal [45,90,SP] SPECIAL and heal for the same amount of HP. If no enemy Pokémon suffer from SLEEP, put the target to SLEEP for [2.5,5,ND=1] seconds.
ability_description.SPARK: Fire a spark charged with electricity at the target, dealing [40,80,SP] SPECIAL. The spark can bounce up to 4 times between adjacent enemy Pokémon. Each rebound halves the SPECIAL.
ability_description.CRUNCH: Deal [40,80,150,SP] SPECIAL to the target. If it kills the target, heal for 50% of the target's max HP.
ability_description.CROSS_POISON: Deal [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL to the target and enemy Pokémon adjacent to them and inflict them with POISONNED for 2 seconds.
ability_description.DOUBLE_EDGE: Deal [55,110,220,SP] PHYSICAL to target. The user hurts itself for [20,40,60,SP] PHYSICAL.
ability_description.FIRE_FANG: Deal [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL to the target and apply BURN for 2 seconds.
ability_description.ICE_FANG: Deal [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL and apply FREEZE for 1 second.
ability_description.THUNDER_FANG: Deal [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL and inflict PARALYSIS for 3 seconds.
ability_description.PSYSHIELD_BASH: Dash to the farthest reachable enemy Pokémon, dealing [60,SP] SPECIAL to all enemy Pokémon in the path and PROTECT the user for 1 second.
ability_description.QUIVER_DANCE: Gain [5,SP] ATK, [5,SP] SPE_DEF, [10,SP] SPEED and 20 AP.
ability_description.TORCH_SONG: Blow out [4,SP] raging flames to random opponents. Each flame deals 50% of ATK as SPECIAL, with [30,LK]% chance to BURN for 2 seconds, and buff the user AP by [1,2,3].
ability_description.POWER_WHIP: Unleash a giant vine toward the farthest enemy Pokémon, dealing [30,60,SP] SPECIAL to any enemy Pokémon in the path.
ability_description.DARK_HARVEST: Teleport into the largest group of enemy Pokémon. Inflict the user with SILENCE for 3 seconds and drain the HP of adjacent enemy Pokémon, dealing [5,10,20,SP] SPECIAL per second and heal for 30% of the damage dealt.
ability_description.PSYSHOCK: Burn [20,40,80,SP] PP from the target and gain SHIELD for the same amount. Excess damage is dealt as SPECIAL.
ability_description.HEAVY_SLAM: Slam the ground, dealing [15,30,60,SP] SPECIAL to adjacent opponents and gain [15,30,60] SHIELD. The more max HP the user has than the target, the greater the ability's power.
ability_description.RAPID_SPIN: Deal [20,50,SP] SPECIAL and gain [50,SP]% of ATK as DEF and SPE_DEF
ability_description.BOUNCE: Bounce [1,2,3,SP] times to the farthest enemy Pokémon, dealing [10,SP] SPECIAL to all adjacent enemy Pokémon each time.
ability_description.BLOOD_MOON: Ursaluna concentrates all their energy into the blood-red moon on their forehead and projects it in a line, dealing [200,SP]% of ATK as SPECIAL and applying WOUND for 3 seconds to all enemy Pokémon hit.
ability_description.TEA_TIME: Heal all allied Pokémon for [15,30,60,SP] HP. All Pokémon holding a berry eat it immediately.
ability_description.SPIKES: Throw up to [6, SP] metal spikes within a 3 tile sector in front of the user, dealing [25,50,100,SP] SPECIAL to any enemy Pokémon in the area. The spikes remain on the battlefield, dealing 10 TRUE per second and and inflicting ARMOR_BREAK onto non FLYING Pokémon that walk on it.
ability_description.SHADOW_PUNCH: Fly towards the target with the lowest HP. The next attack deals additional [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL.
ability_description.GUNK_SHOT: Deal [50,100,SP] SPECIAL to the target and inflict POISONNED for [2,4,SP] seconds.
ability_description.MAGNET_BOMB: Launch a magnetic bomb dealing [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL to target, [10,20,40,SP] SPECIAL to adjacent enemy Pokémon and attracting distant enemy Pokémon.
ability_description.MUDDY_WATER: Spurt muddy water at up to 3 enemy Pokémon in front of the user, dealing [40,80,SP] SPECIAL and applying WOUND and ARMOR_BREAK for 4 seconds.
ability_description.ANCIENT_POWER: Launch rocks at the target, dealing [40,80,120,SP] SPECIAL. Raise the user's AP by 25%.
ability_description.MOON_DREAM: Put the target to SLEEP for [3,6,9] seconds and grant [10,20,30,SP] SHIELD to the 3 allied Pokémon closest to the target.
ability_description.STONE_AXE: Deal [50,SP] TRUE to the target and lay sharp stones around them. The stones stay on the battlefield, dealing 10 PHYSICAL per second and applying WOUND to any non ROCK and non FLYING Pokémon that walk on it.
ability_description.FLASH: Opponents within a 3-cells radius are BLINDED for [2,4,6,SP,ND=1] seconds.
ability_description.CRUSH_CLAW: Reduce the target's DEF by [5,10] then perform two quick attacks, each dealing [100,SP]% of ATK as PHYSICAL.
ability_description.FIRE_LASH: Deal [120,SP] SPECIAL to the target and apply ARMOR_BREAK for 4 seconds.
ability_description.FAIRY_LOCK: Spread [90,SP] SPECIAL evenly across the target and adjacent enemy Pokémon. The target is LOCKED for 5 seconds.
ability_description.DRAIN_PUNCH: Deal [200,SP]% of ATK as SPECIAL and heal for 200% of the damage dealt.
ability_description.GRAVITY: All enemy Pokémon are LOCKED for [2,SP] seconds.
ability_description.FAKE_OUT: Deal [50,100,150,SP] SPECIAL to the target and reduce the user's AP by 30. Inflict the target with FLINCH for 3 seconds unless the user's AP was negative.
ability_description.FELL_STINGER: Deal [25,50,100,SP] SPECIAL to the target. If it kills the target, permanently gain 1 ATK and 10 HP.
ability_description.GULP_MISSILE: Shoot an $t(pkm.ARROKUDA) with full PP at the target, dealing [55,SP] SPECIAL to the target and adjacent enemy Pokémon. There is a [33,LK]% chance a $t(pkm.PIKACHU) will be fired instead.
ability_description.SCHOOLING: Deal [10,SP]% of the user's max HP as SPECIAL to the target and adjacent enemy Pokémon. If a Wishiwashi is on the bench, it joins the school and gives 50 permanent max HP to the user.
ability_description.DOUBLE_SHOCK: Emit a powerful electric shock, dealing [50,100,200,SP] SPECIAL to the target and inflict the user with PARALYSIS for 3 seconds.
ability_description.PURIFY: Cure negative status conditions and heal the user for [15,30,60,SP] HP.
ability_description.CHARM: Inflict the target with CHARM for 3 seconds and reduce their ATK by [2,3,4,SP] (min 1).
ability_description.ENTRAINMENT: Dance to a strange rhythm, restoring [10,SP] PP and forcing the target to imitate them, which replaces their ability with Entrainment. If target is already entrained, pick another enemy Pokémon nearby.
ability_description.OCTAZOOKA: Shoot a projectile that deals [300,SP]% of the user's ATK as SPECIAL and leave an ink cloud that makes the target BLINDED for 4 seconds.
ability_description.PSYCHO_SHIFT: Shift the position of the target and the farthest enemy, dealing [60,SP] SPECIAL to each.
ability_description.GLAIVE_RUSH: Throw the user's entire body into a reckless charge to the enemy backline, dealing [50,100,200,SP] SPECIAL to all enemies in its column. Then the user gets ARMOR_BREAK for 6 seconds.
ability_description.FOUL_PLAY: Deal [2,4,6,SP,ND=1] x the target's ATK as SPECIAL to the target.
ability_description.DOUBLE_IRON_BASH: The user rotates, centering the hex nut in its chest, striking with its arms twice in a row for [150,SP] % of its ATK as PHYSICAL for each hit. This causes the target to FLINCH for 3 seconds.
ability_description.STONE_EDGE: For [5,8] seconds, inflict the user with SILENCE, gain 2 RANGE, [20,SP] CRIT_CHANCE and apply [50,SP]% of its DEF as PHYSICAL on attacks.
ability_description.ROAR: Blow away the target. If they hit a wall, deal [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL. If they hit another Pokémon, both are dealt SPECIAL.
ability_description.INFESTATION: Deal [10,SP] SPECIAL to the target for each allied BUG Pokémon on the battlefield. Once per combat, move the most powerful BUG Pokémon on the allied player's bench to the battlefield.
ability_description.FORCE_PALM: Deal [60,SP] + [10,SP]% of the target's max HP as SPECIAL to the target and inflict them with PARALYSIS for 6 seconds, +[40,SP] SPECIAL and push the target away if they were already suffering from PARALYSIS.
ability_description.THUNDER_CAGE: Trap the target and adjacent enemy Pokémon in an electric prison, dealing [60,SP] SPECIAL and inflicting LOCKED and PARALYSIS for 3 seconds.
ability_description.HEADBUTT: Deal [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL to the target and inflict them with FLINCH for 5 seconds. The damage is doubled if the target has a SHIELD.
ability_description.STEEL_WING: Dash to the farthest reachable enemy Pokémon, dealing [10,20,40,SP] SPECIAL + 2x DEF as SPECIAL and stealing 1 DEF to all enemy Pokémon in the path.
ability_description.YAWN: Gain [10,20,40,SP] SHIELD. Enemy Pokémon targeting the user are inflicted with FATIGUE for 3 seconds and lose 20% AP.
ability_description.FIERY_DANCE: Cloaked in flames, the user dances and flaps its wings dealing [25,50,100,SP] SPECIAL to the target and raises their own AP by 30.
ability_description.BIDE: After 3 seconds, deal SPECIAL damage to adjacent enemy Pokémon equal to [200,SP]% of the damage received during this period.
ability_description.SHORE_UP: Heal for [20,25,SP]% HP, +10% if the weather is SANDSTORM.
ability_description.POISON_STING: Inflict the target with [2,3,4] stacks of POISONNED. Every stack over the max immediately deals [25,50,100,SP] SPECIAL.
ability_description.TRANSE: Start attacking and moving again, but stops passively healing.
ability_description.WOOD_HAMMER: Deal [300,SP]% of ATK as SPECIAL to the target and receive recoil damage equal to 33% of the damage done.
ability_description.TRICK_OR_TREAT: The target must give one of its held items to the user. If it has no held item, it receives a curse whose power increases with user AP.
ability_description.FREEZING_GLARE: Deal [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL to all enemies in a line, with a [50,LK]% chance to FREEZE for 3 seconds
ability_description.THUNDEROUS_KICK: Target is pushed away. It and all enemies on the path are FLINCH for 4 seconds, lose [10,SP] DEF and take [20,40,60,SP] PHYSICAL.
ability_description.FIERY_WRATH: Deal [33,SP] SPECIAL to all enemy Pokémon, with [50,LK]% chance to apply FLINCH for 4 seconds.
ability_description.VISE_GRIP: Grip the target with powerful pincers, dealing [30,60,100,SP] SPECIAL to the target. For 4 seconds, user gains [50,SP]% of target DEF and SPE_DEF, and both are LOCKED.
ability_description.BURN_UP: BURN itself for 3 seconds to inflict [50,100,200,SP] SPECIAL.
ability_description.LANDS_WRATH: The ground erupts, dealing 40 + [100,SP]% ATK as PHYSICAL to the target and adjacent enemies, then lower their DEF and SPE_DEF by [8,SP=0.5].
ability_description.THOUSAND_ARROWS: 33 energy arrows rain down on random tiles, dealing [60,SP] SPECIAL each. All enemies hit are LOCKED for 1 second.
ability_description.CORE_ENFORCER: Deal [150,SP] SPECIAL to the target. The target is LOCKED and SILENCE for 3 seconds.
ability_description.POWER_HUG: Deal [40,80,SP] SPECIAL to the target. The target is LOCKED and PARALYSIS for 3 seconds.
ability_description.MORTAL_SPIN: Knock back any Pokemon targeting the user in melee range. Deal [20,30,40,SP] SPECIAL to any enemies hit, and apply POISONNED for 4 seconds
ability_description.METAL_CLAW: Deal [10,20,40,SP] TRUE to the target and raise the user's ATK by [2,4,6].
ability_description.FIRESTARTER: Gain [10,20,40,SP] SPEED and flies to the furthest enemy, dropping embers on the cells in between. The embers inflict [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL and remain on the ground, so any Pokémon that steps on them BURN and take 10 SPECIAL per second if not FLYING or FIRE.
ability_description.BONE_ARMOR: Flies to the weakest enemy inflicting [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL, healing for the damage dealt. If the target is KO'd, recover its bones to make armor, gaining [4,8,12] DEF and SPE_DEF.
ability_description.RAGE: Get RAGE status for 3 seconds and gain [10,SP]% base ATK for each 10% of max HP missing
ability_description.BRICK_BREAK: Deal [150,SP]% of ATK as TRUE. Breaks target's PROTECT and Magic Bounce.
ability_description.TAUNT: Gain [25,SP=0.5]% of max HP as SHIELD, and force enemies within a 2-tile radius to choose you as target
ability_description.BULK_UP: Increase base ATK and base DEF by [50,SP]%
ability_description.CUT: Deal [40,SP]% of target max HP as SPECIAL. Inflicts WOUND for 5 seconds.
ability_description.FLY: Rise in the air and fall on the farthest target after 1 second, dealing [400,SP]% of ATK as SPECIAL.
ability_description.SURF: A wave pushes the user and enemies in the path into the enemy backline. All enemies hit take [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL.
ability_description.STRENGTH: Deal 2x(ATK + DEF + SPE_DEF) + AP as PHYSICAL
ability_description.TOPSY_TURVY: Deal [40,80,100,SP] SPECIAL to the target. All its ATK, AP, DEF and SPE_DEF buffs become debuffs and vice versa.
ability_description.COLUMN_CRUSH: Builds a pillar on the closest empty spot. If a pillar is already on the board, jumps to it and throw it at the closest target, dealing [50,100,150,SP] + the remaining HP of the pillar as SPECIAL.
ability_description.WONDER_ROOM: Creates a bizarre area around the target in which enemies DEF and SPE_DEF are swapped for 5 seconds and attacks received are SPECIAL that scale with attacker AP.
ability_description.DARK_LARIAT: Swings arms and hits the target several times while moving behind them. Each hit deals [100,SP]% ATK as SPECIAL. Number of hits increase with SPEED. Target is FLINCH during the attack.
ability_description.BOLT_BEAK: Deal [80,SP] SPECIAL, [160,SP] SPECIAL if the target has more than 40 PP.
ability_description.FREEZE_DRY: Deals [70,SP] + 100% of the user's SPE_DEF as SPECIAL to the target. If target is KO, it explodes, and throws sharp ice at adjacent targets dealing [30,SP] + 50% of the user's SPE_DEF as SPECIAL.
ability_description.DRAGON_PULSE: A shockwave from the user's gaping mouth deals [20,SP] SPECIAL to the target and adjacent enemies. The shockwave then reverberates through the enemies.
ability_description.FROST_BREATH: Blows a cold breath, dealing [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL to enemies in a 2-cells range in a cone in front of the user, with [50,LK]% chance to FREEZE for 2 seconds. Can crit by default.
ability_description.SALT_CURE: Adjacent allies gain [10,20,40,SP] SHIELD and their status afflictions cured. Adjacent WATER, STEEL or GHOST enemies suffer from BURN for 5 seconds.
ability_description.SPICY_EXTRACT: Make 1/2/3 closest allies RAGE for [2,SP] seconds
ability_description.SWEET_SCENT: Enemies in a 3-range radius can no longer dodge attacks, lose [6,SP] SPE_DEF and have [30,LK]% chance to be CHARM for 1 second
ability_description.SWALLOW: Store power and boosts its DEF and SPE_DEF by 3 up to 3 times. If below 25% HP, swallow instead, restoring [20,SP]% of max HP per stack. If over 3 stacks, spit up, dealing [40,80,150,SP] SPECIAL to all enemies in front.
ability_description.DECORATE: Decorates the nearest ally, increasing its ATK by [1,2,3,SP] and AP by [10,20,30,SP]
ability_description.DRAGON_CLAW: Deal [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL to the lowest health adjacent enemy and WOUND them for 4 seconds.
ability_description.TAILWIND: Increase the SPEED of all allies by [5,10,15,SP]
ability_description.HORN_ATTACK: Deal [3,4,5,SP] x ATK as SPECIAL to the target and cause ARMOR_BREAK for 8 seconds.
ability_description.RAZOR_LEAF: Throw sharp leaves in a line behind the target. All enemies hit take [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL. Can crit by default.
ability_description.MUD_SHOT: Hurls mud at the target, dealing [25,50,75,SP] SPECIAL and reducing their SPEED by [10,20,30,SP].
ability_description.MALIGNANT_CHAIN: Extends a poisonous chain to ensnare target, inflicting LOCKED and 3 stacks of POISONNED for [3,SP] seconds.
ability_description.FILET_AWAY: Sacrifice 50% of current HP and gain [10,SP] ATK and [20,SP] SPEED

effect_description.INGRAIN: Restore 5 HP every 2 seconds. Get a berry tree.
effect_description.GROWTH: Restore 15 HP every 2 seconds. Get another berry tree.
effect_description.SPORE: Restore 30 HP every 2 seconds. Get a third berry tree.
effect_description.BLAZE: Attacks have [30,LK]% chance to inflict BURN for 3 seconds
effect_description.DESOLATE_LAND: +3 ATK after every hit. After every round, get a FIRE_SHARD (max 1)
effect_description.RAIN_DANCE: +4 PP per second. Get an Old Rod.
effect_description.DRIZZLE: +8 PP per second. Get a Good Rod.
effect_description.PRIMORDIAL_SEA: +12 PP per second. Get a Super Rod.
effect_description.RISING_VOLTAGE: Every fourth attack is a triple attack
effect_description.OVERDRIVE: Every third attack is a triple attack
effect_description.POWER_SURGE: Triple attacks also deal 10 SPECIAL to target and enemies adjacent to it
effect_description.LIGHT_SCREEN: +100 AP. A Unown appears every 3 shops.
effect_description.EERIE_SPELL: +150 AP. After a fight, get an Unown shop.
effect_description.VENOMOUS: [60,LK]% chance to POISONNED. Max stacks of POISONNED +1
effect_description.TOXIC: [100,LK]% chance to POISONNED. Max stacks of POISONNED +2
effect_description.DRAGON_ENERGY: Dragon's second synergy counts double (not the third)
effect_description.DRAGON_SCALES: Dragons gain 5 SHIELD for each STAR of all your DRAGON units on board
effect_description.DRAGON_DANCE: Dragons gain 1 SPEED and 1 AP for each STAR of all your DRAGON units on board
effect_description.PURSUIT: [30,LK]% chance to FLINCH. When knocking out a target, gain 3 ATK, 10 AP and 20% of its max HP.
effect_description.BRUTAL_SWING: When knocking out a target, gain 6 ATK, 20 AP and 40% of its max HP
effect_description.POWER_TRIP: When knocking out a target, gain 10 ATK, 30 AP and 60% of its max HP
effect_description.MERCILESS: MONSTER can target allies with less than 15% of their max HP
effect_description.MEDITATE: Heal for 25% HP of the damage. Get a random TM.
effect_description.FOCUS_ENERGY: Heal for 40% HP of the damage. Get a random TM.
effect_description.CALM_MIND: Heal for 60% HP of the damage. Get a random HM.
effect_description.SWIFT_SWIM: -30% negative status duration. Wave heals 10% HP and deal 5% TRUE.
effect_description.HYDRATION: -60% negative status duration. Wave heals 20% HP and deal 10% TRUE.
effect_description.WATER_VEIL: -90% negative status duration. Wave heals 30% HP and deal 15% TRUE. A second wave hits after 16 seconds.
effect_description.FEATHER_DANCE: Get PROTECT for 2 seconds after flying away
effect_description.MAX_AIRSTREAM: Fly away twice when under 50% HP and 20% HP
effect_description.SKYDIVE: Now perform skydive attacks, dealing 150% PHYSICAL ATK on landing on their target
effect_description.BATTLE_ARMOR: Gain 10 DEF, receive -30% critical damage. Collect one weather rock when the weather changes.
effect_description.MOUTAIN_RESISTANCE: Gain 30 DEF, receive -50% critical damage. Collect up to 2 weather rocks.
effect_description.DIAMOND_STORM: Gain 60 DEF, receive -70% critical damage. Collect up to 3 weather rocks.
effect_description.CURSE_OF_VULNERABILITY: The enemy with the highest DEF + SPE_DEF lose 5 of it and is FLINCH
effect_description.CURSE_OF_WEAKNESS: Also, the enemy with the highest ATK lose 25% of it and is PARALYSIS
effect_description.CURSE_OF_TORMENT: Also, the enemy with the highest AP lose 50% of it and is FATIGUE
effect_description.CURSE_OF_FATE: Also, the strongest enemy is CURSE and will be KO after 7 seconds
effect_description.AROMATIC_MIST: 20% additional SPECIAL to attacks and shocks
effect_description.FAIRY_WIND: 40% additional SPECIAL to attacks and shocks
effect_description.STRANGE_STEAM: 60% additional SPECIAL to attacks and shocks
effect_description.MOON_FORCE: 80% additional SPECIAL to attacks and shocks
effect_description.SHEER_COLD: +60 SPE_DEF, frozen enemies take 30% additional damage
effect_description.ALLEGRO: Ally team gains +1 ATK and +5 SPEED
effect_description.PRESTO: Ally team gains +1 ATK, +5 SPEED and 3 PP
effect_description.DUBIOUS_DISC: Get an artificial item. It is removed when losing the synergy.
effect_description.LINK_CABLE: Gain +6% base ATK, AP and max HP as SHIELD per held item. Get another artificial item.
effect_description.GOOGLE_SPECS: Gain +12% base ATK, AP and max HP as SHIELD per held item. Get another artificial item.
effect_description.HATCHER: Each BABY has [10,LK]% chance to find an Egg.
effect_description.BREEDER: Get at least one Egg after each defeat against a player
effect_description.GOLDEN_EGGS: Each BABY has [5,LK]% chance to find a Golden Egg (max 1 on bench). Golden eggs can be sold for 10 GOLD or give a shiny item when hatched.
effect_description.ETERNAL_LIGHT: Also increase DEF and SPE_DEF by 50% and give RUNE_PROTECT for 8 seconds
effect_description.QUICK_FEET: +30 SPEED. [25,LK]% chance to inflict WOUND for 3 seconds.
effect_description.BERSERK: +40% ATK and +50 SPEED. RAGE 5 seconds sooner
effect_description.FLUID: Ally team gains 1 SPEED and 3 HP per unique active synergy
effect_description.SHAPELESS: Ally team gains 3 SPEED and 6 HP per unique active synergy
effect_description.ETHEREAL: Ally team gains 6 SPEED and 12 HP per unique active synergy
effect_description.APPETIZER: Gain a CHEF_HAT. Cook a Signature Dish after every round and feed one adjacent ally.
effect_description.LUNCH_BREAK: The Chef cook two dishes and feed two adjacent allies after every round.

item_description.FOSSIL_STONE: A fossil of a Pokémon that lived in prehistoric times
item_description.OLD_AMBER: The holder gains the FOSSIL type
item_description.DAWN_STONE: The holder gains the PSYCHIC type
item_description.WATER_STONE: The holder gains the WATER type
item_description.THUNDER_STONE: The holder gains the ELECTRIC type
item_description.FIRE_STONE: The holder gains the FIRE type
item_description.MOON_STONE: The holder gains the FAIRY type
item_description.DUSK_STONE: The holder gains the DARK type
item_description.LEAF_STONE: The holder gains the GRASS type
item_description.ICE_STONE: The holder gains the ICE type
item_description.SOUL_DEW: During combat, the holder gains 10 AP every second
item_description.REAPER_CLOTH: The holder's ability can now critically strike based on CRIT_CHANCE
item_description.POKEMONOMICON: When the holder deals SPECIAL, they BURN the target for 3 seconds
item_description.POWER_LENS: The amount of SPECIAL blocked by SPE_DEF is inflicted back to the attacker
item_description.SHELL_BELL: Holder heals for 33% of all damages inflicted
item_description.AQUA_EGG: The holder gains +50 starting PP and regains 20 PP after casting its ability
item_description.BLUE_ORB: Every 4 attacks, unleashes a chain lightning that bounces to the 2 closest enemies, dealing 10 SPECIAL and burning 20 PP
item_description.SCOPE_LENS: Critical attacks steal 15 PP from the target.
item_description.STAR_DUST: After casting ability, gain 50% of max PP as SHIELD
item_description.GREEN_ORB: Holder and adjacent allies regain 4% of their max HP every second
item_description.MANA_SCARF: The holder attacks restore 8 additional PP
item_description.SMOKE_BALL: Once below 40% max HP, drop the smoke ball and jump to a cell away. Every adjacent enemy is PARALYSIS and BLINDED for 4 seconds.
item_description.XRAY_VISION: +50 SPEED. The holder attacks can no longer miss.
item_description.RAZOR_FANG: +100% CRIT_POWER. Critical attacks apply ARMOR_BREAK for 4 seconds.
item_description.PROTECTIVE_PADS: Attacks deal double damage against SHIELD. User is protected from recoil damage and retaliation effects.
item_description.CHOICE_SCARF: Attacks also hit the lowest health enemy adjacent to target for 50% of the attack damage, which can trigger on-hit effects.
item_description.PUNCHING_GLOVE: Attacks deal 8 % of target max HP as additional PHYSICAL
item_description.DEFENSIVE_RIBBON: When the holder takes damage, gain 1 stack. Every 2 stacks, the holder gains +2 DEF, +1 ATK and +5 SPEED (max 20 stacks)
item_description.WONDER_BOX: At the beginning of each battle, WONDER_BOX is replaced by 2 temporary items (max 3 items held)
item_description.CLEANSE_TAG: When combat begins, the holder and all adjacent allies on the same row receive 20% of their respective HP as SHIELD and RUNE_PROTECT for 5 seconds
item_description.FLUFFY_TAIL: Holder is immune to all status alterations
item_description.KINGS_ROCK: +100 SHIELD + 30% HP as SHIELD when combat begins
item_description.SHINY_CHARM: Prevents damage and give PROTECT for 2 seconds the first time the holders gets below 30% HP
item_description.GRACIDEA_FLOWER: When combat begins, the holder and adjacent allies in the same row gain +20 SPEED
item_description.FLAME_ORB: Holder is burned during the entire fight but increase its base ATK by 100%
item_description.ASSAULT_VEST: +40 SPE_DEF. Reduce BURN and POISONNED damage by 50%
item_description.AMULET_COIN: +1 GOLD each time the holder knocks out an opponent
item_description.POKE_DOLL: Reduce all incoming PHYSICAL and SPECIAL by 30%
item_description.RED_ORB: 25% of attack damage is dealt as TRUE
item_description.MAX_REVIVE: Give RESURECTION, preventing the holder first KO and restoring to max HP
item_description.ROCKY_HELMET: +25 DEF. Negates critical bonus damage from incoming critical hits.
item_description.AGUAV_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, restore 50% HP and get CONFUSION for 3 seconds
item_description.APICOT_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 20 HP and gain 20 SPE_DEF
item_description.ASPEAR_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP or after being FREEZE, heal 20 HP and give +15 SPEED and immunity to FREEZE for the rest of the fight
item_description.BABIRI_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP or after receiving a critical hit, heal 20 HP and gain PROTECT for 2 seconds
item_description.CHERI_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP or after being PARALYSIS, heal 20 HP and give +10 ATK and immunity to PARALYSIS for the rest of the fight
item_description.CHESTO_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP or after being SLEEP, heal 20 HP and give +50 AP and immunity to SLEEP for the rest of the fight
item_description.GANLON_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 20 HP and gain 20 DEF
item_description.JABOCA_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 20 HP and cast $t(ability.SPIKE_ARMOR) for 10 seconds
item_description.LANSAT_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 20 HP and gain 50% CRIT_CHANCE
item_description.LEPPA_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP or after casting ability, heal 20 HP and gain 50 PP once
item_description.LIECHI_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 20 HP and gain 15 ATK
item_description.LUM_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 20 HP, clear negative status and get RUNE_PROTECT for 5 seconds
item_description.ORAN_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 20 HP and gain 80 SHIELD
item_description.PECHA_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP or after being POISONNED, heal 50 HP and give immunity to POISONNED for the rest of the fight
item_description.PERSIM_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP or after being CONFUSION, heal 20 HP and give 10 SPE_DEF and immunity to CONFUSION for the rest of the fight
item_description.PETAYA_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 20 HP and gain 80 AP
item_description.RAWST_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP or after being BURN, heal 20 HP and give 10 DEF and immunity to BURN for the rest of the fight
item_description.ROWAP_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 20 HP and cast $t(ability.MAGIC_BOUNCE) for 10 seconds
item_description.SALAC_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 20 HP and gain 50 SPEED
item_description.SITRUS_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 30 HP and increase all healing received by 30%
item_description.COMFEY: Wears $t(pkm.COMFEY) and get its ability and all its base stats
item_description.ELECTIRIZER: Every third attack burns 15 PP of the target and inflicts PARALYSIS for 2 seconds. Dropped when benching the unit.
item_description.MAGMARIZER: Every successful attack increase ATK by 1 and inflicts BURN for 2 seconds. Dropped when benching the unit.
item_description.MACHO_BRACE: Gives FIGHTING synergy. Dropped when benching the unit.
item_description.LIGHT_BALL: Gives LIGHT synergy. Dropped when benching the unit.
item_description.TOXIC_ORB: Gives POISON synergy. Holder is POISONNED but increase its ATK by 100%. Dropped when benching the unit.
item_description.METRONOME: Gives SOUND synergy. Every second, the holder gains 5 PP. Dropped when benching the unit.
item_description.METAL_COAT: Gives STEEL synergy. Dropped when benching the unit.
item_description.SWIFT_WING: Gives FLYING synergy. Gain 10% chance to dodge attacks. Dropped when benching the unit.
item_description.HARD_STONE: Gives ROCK synergy. Dropped when benching the unit.
item_description.BIG_NUGGET: Gives GROUND synergy. If the holder is alive after 15 seconds and gets 5 stacks of GROUND, gain 3 GOLD. Dropped when benching the unit.
item_description.INCENSE: Each Pokémon in shop has an additional 5% chance to share a common synergy with the holder. Dropped when benching the unit.
item_description.EXP_SHARE: Get the best ATK, AP, DEF and SPE_DEF values of adjacent allies in the same row. Dropped when benching the unit.
item_description.POKERUS_VIAL: Infects the holder with POKERUS, gaining 1 ATK and 10 AP every 2.5 seconds and transmitting to allies. Dropped when benching the unit.
item_description.ROTOM_PHONE: Gives GHOST synergy. Summons Rotom Drone near the holder. Dropped when benching the unit.
item_description.SILK_SCARF: Gives NORMAL synergy and increase SHIELD from all sources by 50%. Dropped when benching the unit.
item_description.TINY_MUSHROOM: Gives BUG synergy but reduce the holder's max HP by 50% when cloned. Dropped when benching the unit.
item_description.METEORITE: A meteorite that seems to interact with Deoxys. It continues to give off a faint glow and is slightly warm to the touch.
item_description.TRASH: The remains of an artificial item. No effect. Dropped when benching the unit.
item_description.OLD_ROD: After each PvP round, fish a Pokémon that is then added to a free slot on your bench. Can catch common and uncommon WATER Pokémon as well as Magikarp.
item_description.GOOD_ROD: After each PvP round, fish a Pokémon that is then added to a free slot on your bench. Can catch rare WATER Pokémon and Feebas.
item_description.SUPER_ROD: After each PvP round, fish a Pokémon that is then added to a free slot on your bench. Can catch epic WATER Pokémon and Wishiwashi.
item_description.DYNAMAX_BAND: At the start of the fight, raise max HP by 200%.
item_description.SHINY_STONE: Gives LIGHT synergy and +1 to LIGHT synergy level. Spawn a second light spot on the holder's cell.
item_description.RARE_CANDY: Immediately make a Pokémon evolve. Can only be given to non-fully evolved Pokémon, and reduce its sell price to its previous tier.
item_description.EVIOLITE: Holder gets a bunch of stats, but can no longer evolve. Can only be given to non-fully evolved Pokémon.
item_description.WHITE_FLUTE: Spawn 3 WILD Pokémon around the holder at the start of the fight. Rarity and tier increase with stage level.
item_description.GOLD_BOTTLE_CAP: +1% CRIT_CHANCE and CRIT_POWER per GOLD you have. Gain 1 GOLD per KO. If eliminating the last enemy, get a Jackpot that doubles the amount gained during the round.
item_description.ABSORB_BULB: All the damage reduction is absorbed by the bulb. Once under 50% HP, bulb explodes, dealing all damage absorbed to adjacent enemy units as SPECIAL.
item_description.SACRED_ASH: Gives RESURECTION. After resurecting, up to 3 allies KO are resurected as well, but without items.
item_description.COMET_SHARD: Starts the round by diving like a comet on an enemy at the opposite side of the board, dealing 300% ATK as SPECIAL to target and adjacent enemies, while gaining PROTECT for 3 seconds.
item_description.REPEAT_BALL: For every 2 shop rerolls, gain 1 SPEED and 2 SHIELD. Additionally, each time you spend gold on a reroll, gain 1 free reroll. After lots of rerolls, you may encounter powerful Pokémon in your shop.
item_description.DAMP_ROCK: Counts for 3 towards RAIN. Under RAIN, your team gains +2 PP per second.
item_description.ICY_ROCK: Counts for 3 towards SNOW. Under SNOW, your team recovers from FREEZE 20% faster and have 5% additional chance to FREEZE their opponents with their attacks.
item_description.HEAT_ROCK: Counts for 3 towards SUN. Under SUN, your team takes 20% less damage from BURN and have 5% additional chance to BURN their opponents with their attacks.
item_description.SMOOTH_ROCK: Counts for 3 towards SANDSTORM. Under SANDSTORM, your team takes 20% less sandstorm damage and gain 1 SPEED every second.
item_description.BLACK_AUGURITE: Counts for 3 towards NIGHT. Under NIGHT, your team gains 5% CRIT_CHANCE and take 5% less critical damage.
item_description.ELECTRIC_QUARTZ: Counts for 3 towards STORM. Under STORM, your team gains 50 SHIELD when struck by lightning and recovers from PARALYSIS 20% faster.
item_description.FLOAT_STONE: Counts for 3 towards WINDY. Under WINDY, your team gains 5 SPEED.
item_description.MIST_STONE: Counts for 3 towards MISTY. Under MISTY, your team gains 3 SPE_DEF.
item_description.BLOOD_STONE: Counts for 3 towards BLOODMOON. Under BLOODMOON, your team gets 30% of incoming healing as SHIELD when WOUND, and heal for 20% of damage dealt if target is WOUND.
item_description.SMELLY_CLAY: Counts for 3 towards SMOG. Under SMOG, your team gains 5% accuracy and has 10% less chance to get POISONNED.
item_description.FIRE_SHARD: Sacrifice 3 player HP to give permanently +3 ATK to a FIRE Pokémon. Immediately consumed when given.
item_description.TEAL_MASK: This carved wooden mask is adorned with crystals, grants 50 SHIELD and allows Ogerpon to wield the FLORA type during battle.
item_description.WELLSPRING_MASK: This carved wooden mask is adorned with crystals, grants 50 SHIELD and allows Ogerpon to wield the AQUATIC type during battle.
item_description.HEARTHFLAME_MASK: This carved wooden mask is adorned with crystals, grants 50 SHIELD and allows Ogerpon to wield the FIRE type during battle.
item_description.CORNERSTONE_MASK: This carved wooden mask is adorned with crystals, grants 50 SHIELD and allows Ogerpon to wield the ROCK type during battle.
item_description.ZYGARDE_CUBE: Contains cells of the Order Pokemon, Zygarde. It will cause a transformation into one of its alternate formes.
item_description.TM: Teaches a HUMAN Pokémon a new ability and set its max PP to 100. Can only be used once.
item_description.CHEF_HAT: The holder will cook their Signature Dish between rounds. Dropped when benching the unit.
item_description.RAGE_CANDY_BAR: Gain 5 ATK in the next fight.
item_description.TEA: Gain 50 PP at the start of the next fight.
item_description.CURRY: Start the next fight RAGE for 5 seconds.
item_description.CASTELIACONE: The first attack in the next fight will inflict FREEZE for 5 seconds on hit.
item_description.WHIPPED_DREAM: The first attack in the next fight will inflict CHARM for 5 seconds on hit.
item_description.BERRY_JUICE: Gain 50 SHIELD at the start of the next fight, and every time a berry is consumed.
item_description.TART_APPLE: In the next fight, each attack by this pokémon will remove 2 DEF from the target. Will turn into a SWEET_APPLE after one round.
item_description.SWEET_APPLE: In the next fight, each attack by this pokémon will remove 2 SPE_DEF from the target. Will turn into a SIRUPY_APPLE after one round.
item_description.SIRUPY_APPLE: In the next fight, each attack by this pokemon has [30,LK]% chance to inflict PARALYSIS for 1 second.
item_description.SWEET_HERB: Gain 50 AP in the next fight.
item_description.POFFIN: Gain 50 SHIELD. All held berries are added to the poffin. Their effects are applied immediately, with healed HP turned into SHIELD.
item_description.HONEY: Each Pokémon in the next shop rerolls this round has an additional 5% chance to share a common synergy with a Pokémon eating HONEY.
item_description.ROCK_SALT: Start the next fight with RUNE_PROTECT for 8 seconds.
item_description.NUTRITIOUS_EGG: Start the next fight with +30% base ATK, DEF and SPE_DEF.
item_description.LEFTOVERS: No effect. There is not much left to eat.
item_description.BLACK_SLUDGE: POISONNED the Pokémon that eats it. If it has POISON type, restore 5% of max HP every 2 seconds instead.
item_description.BINDING_MOCHI: The first attack in the next fight will inflict CHARM and POISONNED for 4 seconds on hit.
item_description.FRUIT_JUICE: Gain 30 SPEED in the next fight.
item_description.LEEK: Gain 30% CRIT_CHANCE and allow ability to critically strike in the next fight.
item_description.LARGE_LEEK: Gain 30% CRIT_POWER and allow ability to critically strike in the next fight.
item_description.SPINDA_COCKTAIL: A cocktail with [LK] random effects that can buff stats or make you dizzy.
item_description.SMOKED_FILET: Permanently lose 10 max HP to gain 3 ATK and 5 AP.
item_description.SWEETS: A random candy granting a permanent stats bonus
item_description.VANILLA_FLAVOR: Baked with NORMAL FLYING ARTIFICIAL allies. Use it on $t(pkm.MILCERY) to evolve into a $t(pkm.ALCREMIE_VANILLA). $t(passive_description.VANILLA_CREAM)
item_description.RUBY_FLAVOR: Baked with FIGHTING HUMAN STEEL allies. Use it on $t(pkm.MILCERY) to evolve into a $t(pkm.ALCREMIE_RUBY). $t(passive_description.RUBY_CREAM)
item_description.MATCHA_FLAVOR: Baked with GRASS FLORA POISON GHOST allies. Use it on $t(pkm.MILCERY) to evolve into a $t(pkm.ALCREMIE_MATCHA). $t(passive_description.MATCHA_CREAM)
item_description.MINT_FLAVOR: Baked with WATER AQUATIC ICE allies. Use it on $t(pkm.MILCERY) to evolve into a $t(pkm.ALCREMIE_MINT). $t(passive_description.MINT_CREAM)
item_description.LEMON_FLAVOR: Baked with ELECTRIC BUG FAIRY SOUND allies. Use it on $t(pkm.MILCERY) to evolve into a $t(pkm.ALCREMIE_LEMON). $t(passive_description.LEMON_CREAM)
item_description.SALTED_FLAVOR: Baked with ROCK GROUND FOSSIL allies. Use it on $t(pkm.MILCERY) to evolve into a $t(pkm.ALCREMIE_SALTED). $t(passive_description.SALTED_CREAM)

item_description.CARAMEL_SWIRL_FLAVOR: Baked with DARK MONSTER DRAGON allies. Use it on $t(pkm.MILCERY) to evolve into a $t(pkm.ALCREMIE_CARAMEL_SWIRL). $t(passive_description.CARAMEL_SWIRL_CREAM)

item_description.EGG_FOR_SELL: An Egg sold at Chansey's Daycare
item_description.GIMMIGHOUL_COIN: Get 1 additional GOLD income each round, and increase max interests by 1.
item_description.EXCHANGE_TICKET: Exchange an item component or a crafted item on bench for another random one. Single use.

passive_description.TYROGUE:
Will choose a combat discipline based on the first item given:
CHARCOAL MAGNET: $t(pkm.HITMONLEE)
HEART_SCALE NEVER_MELT_ICE: $t(pkm.HITMONCHAN)
Others: $t(pkm.HITMONTOP)
passive_description.PROTEAN2: The Pokémon acquires the typing of the 2 highest synergies on the team
passive_description.PROTEAN3: The Pokémon acquires the typing of the 3 highest synergies on the team
passive_description.CASTFORM: Castform changes its form and the weather to SUN, RAIN or SNOW depending on your dominant synergy between FIRE WATER ICE
passive_description.PHIONE: Phione is looking for an AQUA_EGG
passive_description.SCYTHER: $t(pkm.SCYTHER) is looking for a METAL_COAT or a BLACK_AUGURITE
passive_description.PRIMAL: Legend has it that you could unleash the ancient powers of these Pokémon
passive_description.WONDER_GUARD: Blocks 20 damage on every hit received
passive_description.ELECTRIC_TERRAIN: Give ELECTRIC_FIELD to your ELECTRIC Pokemon, boosting their damage by 20%
passive_description.GRASSY_TERRAIN: Give GRASS_FIELD to your GRASS Pokemon, boosting their damage by 20%
passive_description.MISTY_TERRAIN: Give FAIRY_FIELD to your FAIRY Pokemon, boosting their damage by 20%
passive_description.PSYCHIC_TERRAIN: Give PSYCHIC_FIELD to your Psychic Pokemon, boosting their damage by 20%
passive_description.EEVEE: Eevee can evolve into one of the 8 Eeveelutions when given a synergy stone
passive_description.TYPE_NULL: $t(pkm.TYPE_NULL) can evolve into $t(pkm.SILVALLY) when given a synergy item
passive_description.RKS_SYSTEM: RKS system: $t(pkm.SILVALLY) can change its synergy items at any time. Place it on bench to drop synergy items.
passive_description.SUDOWOODO:
Pretends to be a tree and does not attack but gain [2,4] ATK per second instead (stackable).
Starts attacking when PP bar is full, cannot be SILENCE or lose PP until then.
passive_description.WOBBUFFET: Does not move or attack until PP bar is full, cannot be SILENCE or lose PP until then.
passive_description.DITTO: Ditto can transform to create a 1 STAR copy of one of your Pokémon you drop it over (not Unique, Legendary or Hatch)
passive_description.EGG: You can feel something moving inside

passive_description.CHINGLING: Chingling is looking for a STAR_DUST
passive_description.CHIMECHO: Resonates to the sounds of adjacent allies, which doubles their cry while Chimecho is alive
passive_description.SURGE_SURFER: The surge surfer gets +30 SPEED in ELECTRIC_FIELD or PSYCHIC_FIELD
passive_description.MEGA_LAUNCHER: This Pokémon ability emits 3 SOUND cries instead of one
passive_description.DRY_SKIN: Heals 8 HP per second under RAIN. Gains 25% dodge chance under SANDSTORM. Gains 50 AP under SUN
passive_description.SPOT_PANDA: The Pokémon is immune to CONFUSION and deals [100,SP]% additional SPECIAL to Pokémon CONFUSION

passive_description.NINCADA: After evolving, get Shedinja as well if you have a free space on your bench

passive_description.SAND_STREAM: The Pokémon count as 3 for SANDSTORM

passive_description.WIND_POWER: The Pokémon count as 3 for STORM
passive_description.GLUTTON: Permanently gains max HP when eating: 5 HP for each berry, 10 HP for each dish, 20 HP when cooking as a Chef
passive_description.COMFEY: Comfey cannot hold items. At the start of the fight, the nearest ally with a free item slot wears Comfey and gains all its base stats. Comfey casts it's ability at the same time as it's holder. When its holder is KO, Comfey fights on its own.

passive_description.GHOLDENGO: At the start of each fight, if the player has 50 GOLD or more, $t(pkm.GHOLDENGO) gains RUNE_PROTECT for the entire fight
passive_description.METEOR:
$t(pkm.MINIOR) alternates between its meteor and core forms. The meteor form grants [5,SP] SPEED per attack.
 Core form attacks apply additional effects on target and adjacent enemies:
 Blue: Deals [100,SP]% SPECIAL
 Red: Deals [150,SP]% PHYSICAL
 Orange: Deals [50,SP]% TRUE

passive_description.MIMIKYU: When hit under 50% HP, Mimikyu changes into its Busted Form, gaining 10 ATK and PROTECT for 2 seconds
passive_description.MIMIKYU_BUSTED: Its neck is broken. Mimikyu will never forget the person who damaged its rag for as long as it is still alive.

 Normal form triple attacks inflicts PARALYSIS for 2 seconds.

passive_description.LYCANROC: $t(pkm.LYCANROC_DUSK) turns into night form during NIGHT and day form during SUN
passive_description.COSMOG: $t(pkm.COSMOG) is feeding with the energy of the stars. Gain 10 permanent max HP every time you evolve a unit. Evolve after 10 times.
passive_description.COSMOEM: $t(pkm.COSMOEM) is feeding with the energy of the stars. Gain 10 permanent max HP every time you evolve a unit. Evolve after 10 times into $t(pkm.SOLGALEO) if in the light spot, or $t(pkm.LUNALA) instead.
passive_description.SOUL_HEART: Every time the caster gets a KO, gain 10 AP and 10 PP
passive_description.ALIEN_DNA: $t(pkm.DEOXYS) reacts to METEORITE by changing shape
passive_description.BERRY_EATER: When the Pokémon attacks a target, he steals all its berries and eats them

passive_description.GUZZLORD: Guzzlord is too heavy to jump and too gluttonous to cook for others. When holding CHEF_HAT, gain 4 permanent AP for every KO.
passive_description.ENVIRONMENTAL_ADAPTATION: This Pokémon adapted its synergies to its region
passive_description.MOTHIM: Mothim gets the synergies of your regional Burmy form
passive_description.PSYDUCK: Has [10,LK]% chance to get CONFUSION when taking a hit. Every time it gets CONFUSION, gain 100 AP
passive_description.RECYCLE: Feed it with berries to gain 10 HP, or with basic components for 25 HP + item stats. Feed it with artificial items to gain 50 HP + item stats, and get TRASH in return
passive_description.DREAM_CATCHER: If its target is SLEEP, holder attacks give 10 SHIELD to the 3 allies closest to it
passive_description.SLOW_START: Starts with -30 SPEED. After first ability cast, gains 30 SPEED and 10 ATK
passive_description.STONJOURNER: Does not move or attack until PP bar is full. Its power spot gives 50 AP to all adjacent allies at the start of the fight
passive_description.POISON_PIN: Poipole will evolve into Naganadel after stacking 200 HP
passive_description.PYUKUMUKU: When this pokemon is KO, it explodes dealing [100,SP] SPECIAL to adjacent enemies.
passive_description.LUVDISC: The allies on its left and on its right fall in love, and share the best value of their respective ATK, AP, DEF and SPE_DEF at the start of the fight
passive_description.MANTYKE: When Mantyke is on board, gain 30% chance to fish a Remoraid with your fishing rod. Evolves into Mantine if a Remoraid is next to it.
passive_description.MANTINE: When Mantine is on board, gain 30% chance to fish a Remoraid with your fishing rod.
passive_description.SABLEYE: Sableye is looking for a RED_ORB
passive_description.MEGA_SABLEYE: Mega Sableye gains RUNE_PROTECT for the entire fight
passive_description.MELMETAL: Melmetal can't gain SPEED. Bonus SPEED is converted into ATK (10 SPEED: 5 ATK)
passive_description.SKARMORY: At the start of the fight, Skarmory scatters spikes around the field. The spikes deal 10 TRUE per second and ARMOR_BREAK to Pokémon that walk on it, if not FLYING.
passive_description.DURANT: Durant basic attacks deals 1 extra TRUE for each BUG ally on your board
passive_description.OGERPON_TEAL:
Ogerpon can wear TEAL_MASK, HEARTHFLAME_MASK, WELLSPRING_MASK and CORNERSTONE_MASK to change its appearance 
 Upon casting, restores [20,SP] HP to adjacent allies

Ogerpon can wear TEAL_MASK, HEARTHFLAME_MASK, WELLSPRING_MASK and CORNERSTONE_MASK to change its appearance 
 Upon casting, gives [20,SP] PP to adjacent allies
passive_description.OGERPON_HEARTHFLAME:
Ogerpon can wear TEAL_MASK, HEARTHFLAME_MASK, WELLSPRING_MASK and CORNERSTONE_MASK to change its appearance 
 Upon casting, BURN adjacent enemies for 5 seconds
passive_description.OGERPON_CORNERSTONE:
Ogerpon can wear TEAL_MASK, HEARTHFLAME_MASK, WELLSPRING_MASK and CORNERSTONE_MASK to change its appearance

passive_description.VICTINI: Increases the accuracy of the team. Allies can no longer miss their attacks.
passive_description.AEGISLASH: Alternates between Shield Forme and Blade Forme when casting ability
passive_description.DARMANITAN: When below 30% HP, jumps to a safe place and turns into Zen Mode.
passive_description.DARMANITAN_ZEN: Can no longer move or attack, but regain [15,SP] HP per second. Transforms back into Standard Mode when fully healed.
passive_description.GOOD_LUCK: Increase the LUCK of all allies by 20%
passive_description.PRIMEAPE: Primeape becomes angrier when knocked out, gaining 1 permanent ATK. After Primeape is knocked out 10 times, it evolves into Annihilape.
passive_description.ZYGARDE10: Zygarde will absorb its cells, transforming into another form. Once below 30% max HP, it absorbs all of its cells, taking its complete form.
passive_description.ZYGARDE50: Zygarde will absorb its cells, transforming into another form. Once below 30% max HP, it absorbs all of its cells, taking its complete form.
passive_description.GLIMMORA: Once below 50% max HP, throws toxic spikes in a 2x3 rectangle in front of itself, dealing 20 SPECIAL. Toxic spikes apply POISONNED to Pokémon, unless they are POISON.
passive_description.PILLAR: Builds a movable pillar that blocks the path of enemies, with increased HP, DEF and SPE_DEF based on unit STAR.
passive_description.INANIMATE: Inanimate objects cannot be copied, benched or sold. They cannot move or attack, and are immune to status effects.
passive_description.BERSERK: Gains 3 AP each time a Pokemon is affected by its ability.
passive_description.APPLIN: Applin is looking for a SWEET_APPLE or a TART_APPLE or a SIRUPY_APPLE to eat.
passive_description.DIPPLIN: Dipplin is looking for a SIRUPY_APPLE to eat.
passive_description.WELL_BAKED: The Pokémon doesn't suffer from BURN. Instead, it gains 20 DEF when it is affected by BURN.
passive_description.CONVERSION: Conversion: get the highest synergy of your opponent and its effects at the start of the fight.
passive_description.CREAM: $t(pkm.MILCERY) is looking for a delicious flavor...
passive_description.VANILLA_CREAM: Upon casting, the VANILLA_FLAVOR adds [60,SP] SHIELD to the nearest ally

passive_description.MINT_CREAM: Upon casting, the MINT_FLAVOR heals [40,SP] HP and adds [15,SP] SPE_DEF to the nearest ally
passive_description.LEMON_CREAM: Upon casting, the LEMON_FLAVOR adds [40,SP] % CRIT_CHANCE to the nearest ally
passive_description.SALTED_CREAM: Upon casting, the SALTED_FLAVOR heals [40,SP] HP and adds [15,SP] DEF to the nearest ally
passive_description.RUBY_SWIRL_CREAM: Upon casting, the RUBY_SWIRL_FLAVOR adds [8,SP] ATK to the nearest ally
passive_description.CARAMEL_SWIRL_CREAM: Upon casting, the CARAMEL_SWIRL_FLAVOR adds [80,SP] % CRIT_POWER to the nearest ally
passive_description.RAINBOW_SWIRL_CREAM: Upon casting, the RAINBOW_SWIRL_FLAVOR adds [60,SP] AP to the nearest ally

stat_description.ATK: Damage inflicted on each basic attack
stat_description.SPEED: Frequency of attacks, movement speed and cooldown times. Maximum 300.
stat_description.CRIT_CHANCE: Critical hits deal 2x more damage. Abilities cannot crit by default. Crit chance over 100% is converted to Crit power.
stat_description.CRIT_POWER: Multiplier for critical hits damage, healing and buffs
stat_description.HP: Pokémon is knocked out when it no longer has Health Points
stat_description.MAX_PP: Amount of PP required to cast ability. Pokemons receive PP over time (10 per second), when attacking (5 per attack) and when receiving damage (10% of incoming damage)
stat_description.AP: Increase SPECIAL and ability effects in various ways.
stat_description.SHIELD: Temporary health points, cannot be healed.
stat_description.LUCK: Multiplier for random draws, influences all effects involving chance.

status_description.BURN: Deals 5% of max HP as TRUE every second. Reduce healing by 50%.
status_description.SILENCE: Prevents casting abilities and gaining PP
status_description.FATIGUE: Reduce PP gain from all sources by 50%
status_description.POISONNED: Deals 5% of max HP per stack as TRUE every second. Can stack up to 3 times by default.
status_description.PROTECT: Protects from any source of damage, but prevents healing and PP gain. Enemies will avoid targeting a protected unit.
status_description.SLEEP: Prevents moving, dodging or attacking. Receiving attacks reduces the duration of the effect.
status_description.CONFUSION: Force to change target all the time and sometimes deal damage to itself
status_description.RAGE: Double damage and speed, half shield, healing, freeze and sleep durations, lose PROTECT. All units become RAGE after 35 seconds of fight.
status_description.RESURECTION: Prevents KO once, restoring to max HP
status_description.PARALYSIS: Reduce SPEED by 50 and prevents dodging attacks
status_description.POKERUS: Every 2.5 seconds, gain 1 ATK and 10 AP before infecting 2 adjacent allies with POKERUS
status_description.CHARM: Prevents attacking the target and forces to get closer to it
status_description.CURSE: KOs the cursed Pokémon after some time
status_description.LOCKED: Prevents moving and sets RANGE to 1

synergy_description.NORMAL: NORMAL Pokémon and their adjacent allies gain SHIELD when combat starts.
synergy_description.GRASS: GRASS Pokémon heal and produce berries over time.
synergy_description.FIRE: FIRE Pokémon have a chance to BURN their enemies, and gain ATK after every hit.
synergy_description.WATER: WATER Pokémon generate more PP and can be fished with a rod.
synergy_description.ELECTRIC: ELECTRIC Pokémon basic attacks can trigger two additional attacks.
synergy_description.FIGHTING: FIGHTING Pokémon block a flat amount of damage on every hit received. After 10 hits blocked, throw the target away, destroying their SHIELD.
synergy_description.PSYCHIC: PSYCHIC Pokémon gain additional AP and attract Unowns.
synergy_description.DARK: DARK Pokémon's critical hits are more powerful and more frequent. Melee Dark Pokémon jump to the farthest target reachable.
synergy_description.STEEL: STEEL Pokémon deal a percentage of their damage as TRUE.
synergy_description.GROUND: GROUND Pokémon gain bonus ATK, DEF and SPE_DEF every 3 seconds, up to 5 times.
synergy_description.POISON: POISON Pokémon have a chance to POISONNED their target for 4 seconds with their basic attacks. Poison inflicts TRUE over time
synergy_description.DRAGON: DRAGON amplify synergies and gain more stats when fully evolved.
synergy_description.FIELD: When a FIELD Pokémon is KO'd, all the other FIELD Pokémon are healed and gain SPEED
synergy_description.MONSTER: MONSTER Pokémon can FLINCH their opponents for 3 seconds on attack. Every time they get a KO, they gain stats, heal and grow in size.
synergy_description.HUMAN: HUMAN Pokémon heal for a percentage of the damage they deal with attacks and abilities, and can learn a new ability with TMs and HMs.
synergy_description.AQUATIC: AQUATIC Pokémon reduce the duration of status afflictions for all your team. After 8 seconds, a tidal wave cleans up negative status and field effects, heals your AQUATIC allies, and knocks back and damages enemies.
synergy_description.BUG: At the start of combat, your strongest BUG Pokémon are cloned.
synergy_description.FLYING: FLYING Pokémon fly away when they fall under a certain amount of HP unless affected by PARALYSIS, FREEZE or SLEEP.
synergy_description.FLORA: When the first FLORA Pokémon is KO'd, a flower blossoms. The new Pokémon receives one random item from each FLORA ally KO'd.
synergy_description.ROCK: ROCK Pokémon gain DEF, better resist to critical damage, and can adapt to weather.
synergy_description.GHOST: GHOST applies various curses on opposing Pokémon. GHOST Pokémon have a [20,LK]% chance to dodge attacks and apply SILENCE on hit when synergy active.
synergy_description.FAIRY: FAIRY Pokémon deal additional SPECIAL with their attacks and trigger shocks when critically hit, retaliating for 30% of incoming damage.
synergy_description.ICE: ICE Pokémon have a chance to FREEZE the enemy for 2 seconds after a hit and give SPE_DEF to your whole team.
synergy_description.FOSSIL: When they are first KO'd, FOSSIL Pokémon come back to life with increased ATK.
synergy_description.SOUND: SOUND Pokémon emit a cry when they use their abilities, waking up sleeping allies and giving them bonus stats.
synergy_description.ARTIFICIAL: ARTIFICIAL Pokémon give unique items and gain ATK, AP and SHIELD when holding items.
synergy_description.BABY: BABY Pokémon have a chance to bring you Pokemon Eggs to comfort you after a defeat. Chance stacks with losing streaks.{{additionalInfo}}
synergy_description.LIGHT: LIGHT Pokémon reveal a spotlight on the battlefield. The Pokémon standing in the spotlight at the start of combat gains unique bonuses.
synergy_description.WILD: WILD Pokémon get increased SPEED and ATK, and their attacks can WOUND their target. For each WILD Pokémon STAR on board, gain +1% chance to find WILD in your shops + 5% chance during PvE rounds.{{additionalInfo}}
synergy_description.WILD_ADDITIONAL: Current chance to find a WILD pokemon: {{wildChance}}%
synergy_description.AMORPHOUS: AMORPHOUS Pokémon are extremely flexible and lack their own shape. Your team gains HP and SPEED by activating a wide variety of synergies.
synergy_description.GOURMET: GOURMET Pokémon can be equipped with a CHEF_HAT. Chefs will cook up their Signature Dish between fights and feed adjacent allies, giving them various buffs and effects.

weather_description.RAIN:
+3 PP per second
-30% BURN and POISONNED damage
weather_description.STORM:
Lightning randomly strikes on the board, dealing 100 SPECIAL (ELECTRIC are immune)
+30% PARALYSIS duration
weather_description.SANDSTORM:
5 SPECIAL per second (GROUND are immune)
+30% CONFUSION duration

faq.official_game_answer: No, this is a fan game; made by fans, for fans. All rights/credits to Pokemon Company.
faq.how_pokemon_evolve_answer: You need 3 copies of the same Pokémon to get the evolution. The 3 Pokémon will merge to give the evolved Pokémon. Hatch Pokemon that come from eggs evolve automatically with time every 5 stages.
faq.income_answer: You get 5 gold per round whether you draw, win or lose. You get 1 bonus income per 10 gold saved. A maximum of 5 bonus income accrued at 50 saved gold. You get 1 bonus gold if you win. If you win multiple times, you will also gain extra gold; one bonus gold for every victory/defeat, up to 5 bonus gold for 5 streak wins / 5 streak defeat. Wins/Defeats against PVE are not taken into account.
faq.collection: What is the purpose of the collection/booster ?
faq.collection_answer: When opening boosters, you get Pokémon shards. Those shards are specific to every Pokémon. In the collection tab, you can buy Pokémon emotions with those shards. You can see Pokémon emotions as a detailed customization. When selecting an emotion Pokémon portrait, the Pokémon will appear everywhere with the same emotion portrait that you have selected. Eveyone will see the emotion that you picked for this Pokémon. Moreover, if you have selected a shiny emotion, the Pokémon will appear shiny to everyone else.
faq.avatars: How do I get new avatars ?
faq.avatars_answer: When buying a Pokémon emotion, it will be available in your profile avatar list.
faq.boosters_answer: You gain boosters each time you level up.
faq.level_answer: You gain experience each time you finish a game. If you finish first, you'll get 700 xp, if you finish last, you'll get 100 xp.
faq.mythical: How do I get unique / legendary Pokémon ?
faq.mythical_answer: On stages 10 and 20, portals with synergy symbols will appear. Entering a portal will give the opportunity to select one of six powerful Pokemon, with each symbol guaranteeing a synergy of one of the Pokemon. If no portal is entered, all Pokemon options will be entirely random. Symbols are determined by the synergy levels reached by each remaining player, with 4 symbols per player chosen randomly from a pool of one symbol per each of their reached synergy levels.
faq.ditto_answer: Ditto creates a plain copy of the unit you hover and drop it over. Each Pokémon in shop has a 0.5% chance to be a Ditto at every roll. You can't copy unique and hatch Pokémon.
faq.items_answer: You can gain item components by winning PvE rounds or picking one in an item carousel. You can combine two item components to create a powerful tier 2 item. Every Pokémon can hold up to 3 items. The crafting list of all items is available in the wiki, in the items section.
faq.bots_answer: Bots are created by other players. Bots are theme-based, a mewtwo bot will always have an mewtwo in its team at a certain time in the game. Bots have a list of predefined teams at each stage.
faq.create_bot: Can i create my own bot ?
faq.create_bot_answer: Sure. You'll need to be at least level 20 to unlock the Bot Builder gadget. You can use it to create and submit your bot, it will be sent in the #bot-creation channel on Discord for a review by the bot reviewers team.
faq.elo: How does the elo system work ?
faq.elo_answer: The elo system in Pokemon Auto Chess works the same as in other elo based games like Chess, Lol, Starcraft etc... To gain elo points, you need to beat other players. The higher your opponent's elo, the more elo you will gain by defeating him, and vice versa. If you don't play for 15 days, your elo will start to decay (-10 elo/day).
faq.missing_points: I didn't get elo points in my last game, why ?
faq.missing_points_answer: Bots do not give elo, only human players are accounted for elo rating. Smeargle Scribbles also do not give elo. Finally, it is also possible that the game was a custom lobby with elo disabled ("Just for fun" mode)
faq.damage: What are the special damages and physical damages ?
faq.damage_answer: Auto attacks mostly deal Physical damage, while Abilities mostly deal Special damage. Some abilities however can deal true damage or physical damage.
faq.shiny: How do you get shiny Pokémon ?
faq.shiny_answer: You get experience points by playing games. With enough experience, you level up and get a booster pack. Each booster pack gives shards for random Pokémon. Use these shards to purchase the shiny emotes of a Pokémon in the Collection page, then you will get that one Pokémon as a shiny ingame.
faq.support: How can i support the game ?
faq.mobile: Will there be a mobile version one day ?
faq.code: What language/library is used to code the game ?
faq.code_answer: TypeScript, Phaser, Colyseus. If you want to contribute

wiki.data_description: Various data about the game for the geeks
wiki.tiers_by_level_description: The odds of getting a certain rarity of Pokémon in your shop changes with your player level. The higher the level, the higher the rarity and the cost in the shop.
wiki.experience_by_rank_description: You gain experience points at the end of each game based on your final rank. Every 1000 XP, you level up and gain one booster.
wiki.booster_rarity_probability_description: The chances to find a Pokémon in a booster pack depends on its rarity.
wiki.ditto_rate: Chance to find Ditto in shop
wiki.kecleon_rate: Chance to find Kecleon in stage 10 propositions
wiki.arceus_rate: Chance to find Arceus in stage 20 propositions
wiki.fishing_rarity_rate_description: The quality of the rod you use to fish influences the rarity of the Pokémon you can catch.
wiki.defense_calculation_description: Same system as League of Legends: Damage = ATK / (1+(0.05*DEF)), rounded up. DEF works for PHYSICAL, SPE_DEF for SPECIAL.
wiki.round_damage_calculation_description: The damage inflicted to player after losing a round is computed like this: Round damage = (stage level / 2) + (number of opponents alive) ; rounded up, clones/spawns do not count
wiki.pool_size_per_category_description: The pokemons you find in shops are taken from a pool shared by all players. The number of specimens of each Pokémon in the pool depends on its rarity and its number of evolution stages.
